DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether telemedicine would be as effective as having a pediatrics ophthalmologist on site for screening examination of retinopathy in premature infants and would be cost-effective.
DOC.brief_title: Cost-effectiveness of Tele-expertise for Premature Infants for Retinopathy
DOC.criteria: Born before 32 WA or having a birth weight under 1500g Brain malformations
